entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as hurrying back to the entrance to find Ron face-to-face with Xenophilius Lovegood. He is mentioned in the context of being invited by the Weasleys.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as standing face-to-face with Xenophilius Lovegood. He is mentioned in the context of being known to Luna.

entities.name: xenophilius lovegood
entities.description: Xenophilius Lovegood is described as an eccentric-looking wizard with a golden chain around his neck and a triangular eye symbol. He is mentioned in the context of being invited by the Weasleys.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as Xenophilius's daughter and someone Ron knows.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are described as being face-to-face with Xenophilius Lovegood, implying they know each other.
Xenophilius is mentioned as Luna's father.
